name: Keys Please (MrMininja)
description:
Stop all your mates at the pub/club from driving by taking their keys from them.

Big thanks to the voice actors Benabolics, Acki and ActualAzza assisting with voice lines.

Controls
W,A,S,D to move, Left mouse button to take Key and escape to exit the game.

Installation Guide
1) Download File
2) Right click and unzip file
3) Double click Keys Please application
